full_summary:
# Central Agencies Net Zero Ready Apartment Buildings 6-Plex - Invitation to Bid
### Tender Information

Tender Reference Number: MX-43000196647
Solicitation Number: HAXED99_CN81354
Publication Date: January 10, 2024
Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2024, 4:00 PM
Contracting Authority: Defence Construction Canada - Western Region

### Project Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites tenderers to submit a bid for the construction of two (2) six-unit apartment buildings (total 12 units) at 3 Canadian Forces Health Services Centre (CFHS), Edmonton, Alberta. The project aims to meet Net Zero Carbon Ready requirements.

### Key Details

* Estimated Project Value: $6,300,000.00
* Completion Deadline:
	+ Substantial Completion within 550 calendar days after contract award
	+ Final Completion within 30 calendar days after Substantial Completion
* Scope of Work:
	+ Supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment for the construction of the apartment buildings
* Bid Security:
	+ Required; refer to Instructions to Tenderers (Form DCL193E) for details

### Additional Details

* The successful tenderer will be required to comply with the terms and conditions of the contract, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Chapter Nineteen of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).
* Tenderers are advised that in the event of their Tender being accepted and failing to carry out the contract in accordance with the terms of their Tender, their bid security will be forfeited.
* Documents and Bidding Instructions are available on http://www.merx.com (fees may apply).

### Contact Information

For inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact:

Brett Cooper
Contracting Authority, Defence Construction Canada - Western Region
Email: brett.cooper@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
Phone: 780-266-1884

### Site Visit

A non-mandatory site visit will be held on January 17, 2024, at 10:00 am MST, at the Edmonton Garrison Memorial Golf & Country Club. It is highly recommended that bidders attend the site visit and register in advance by emailing the above contact information.
